auth_issues.message: Login functionality detected without session rotation
auth_issues.recommendation: Regenerate session ID after login to prevent session fixation: session.regenerate() or session_regenerate_id()
Implement multi-factor authentication for sensitive applications
Enforce minimum password length (at least 8-12 characters)
Enforce password complexity (uppercase, lowercase, numbers, special characters)

auth_issues.message: Login functionality detected without session rotation
auth_issues.recommendation: Regenerate session ID after login to prevent session fixation: session.regenerate() or session_regenerate_id()
Implement multi-factor authentication for sensitive applications
Enforce minimum password length (at least 8-12 characters)
Enforce password complexity (uppercase, lowercase, numbers, special characters)
Review authentication logic for hardcoded bypasses or weak conditions
Enforce minimum password length (at least 8-12 characters)
Enforce password complexity (uppercase, lowercase, numbers, special characters)

recommendations.title: Remove Hardcoded Secrets
recommendations.description: Move all hardcoded credentials to environment variables or secure vaults.
steps: Use environment variables for sensitive configuration
Implement secrets management (e.g., AWS Secrets Manager, HashiCorp Vault)

recommendations.title: Replace Dangerous Functions
recommendations.description: Replace or properly sanitize dangerous function calls.
steps: Review all uses of eval(), exec(), and similar functions
